description:
In Playful Pack you get up to 10+ hours of new gameplay, more flirting and pics thanks to 80 new levels and 8 new girls:

- journalist blondie Diana
- green-eyed photographer Olga
- lovely waitress Noelle
- pink-haired gamer Willow
- cute rebel Jess
- courageous cosplayer Freja
- social media manager for adult portal Stella
- mysterious witch Hazel 

Which one will become your waifu? ;)
name: Eroblast: Playful Pack
